entities.name: fletcher
entities.description: Fletcher is a thief who knows how to avoid capture and has many hidey-holes and accomplices. He was cornered by Kreacher in the end.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who cornered Fletcher in the end. Harry praised Kreacher for doing well.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who praised Kreacher for doing well and questioned Mundungus about his actions.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is a person who panicked and ran out on Mad-eye. He was being hunted down by house-elves.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who told Mundungus that none of the rest of them Disapparated.

relationships.description: Kreacher cornered Fletcher in the end.
Harry questioned Mundungus about his actions.
